This website presents all the code used for the forthcoming paper "High cost of meiotic driving X chromosomes in female flies" by William Larner, Tom Price, Luke Holman, and Nina Wedell.



# Statistical analysis
Click [here](statistics.html) to see the code used to analyse and plot the female fecundity data.

# Population genetic model
Click [here](population_genetic_model.html) to see the code used to run the model that derives expected frequencies of SR.
